name: XPO Logistics, Inc.
description: XPO Logistics, Inc. is a leading global provider of supply chain solutions, with a focus on transportation and logistics services. Founded in 1989, XPO has rapidly expanded its operations through strategic acquisitions and organic growth, making it one of the largest logistics providers worldwide. The company offers a comprehensive range of services, including freight brokerage, last mile delivery, contract logistics, and supply chain optimization. XPO is recognized for its innovative technology solutions, which enhance visibility, efficiency, and reliability across its supply chain network. The company operates a highly integrated platform that connects shippers and carriers, facilitating seamless logistics operations. With a commitment to sustainability, XPO is also focused on reducing carbon emissions in its transportation fleet and optimizing routes to improve energy efficiency. XPO serves a diverse customer base across various industries, including retail, e-commerce, healthcare, and manufacturing. Its mission is to provide exceptional service and value to customers while driving operational excellence and innovation in the logistics sector.
